content.text: What is the stiffness matrix for this part of the groove structure?

The red circle marks a corner in the groove structure. For corners, it is best to have uniform low stiffness in all directions to prevent excessive forces on the walls.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [100, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
